DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . Determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) metformin ( metformin hydrochloride ) combination cytarabine relapsed/refractory AML . II . Define dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) metformin combination cytarabine relapsed/refractory AML . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I. Remission rate . II . Overall survival ( OS ) . III . Disease-free survival ( DFS ) . IV . Length remission . OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study metformin hydrochloride combination Cytarabine . Patients receive metformin hydrochloride orally ( PO ) twice daily ( BID ) day 1-15 cytarabine intravenously ( IV ) 3 hour BID day 4-10 . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 3 month 2 year every 6 month 5 year .
